6567  double precision :: btilR(ixI^S,ndim)
6568  double precision :: cp(ixI^S,2)
6569  double precision :: cm(ixI^S,2)
6570  double precision :: circ(ixI^S,1:ndim)
6571  ! non-ideal electric field on cell edges
6572  double precision, dimension(ixI^S,7-2*ndim:3) :: E_resi, E_ambi
6573  integer :: hxC^L,ixC^L,ixCp^L,jxC^L,ixCm^L
6574  integer :: idim1,idim2,idir
6575 
6576  associate(bfaces=>s%ws,bfacesct=>sct%ws,x=>s%x,vbarc=>vcts%vbarC,cbarmin=>vcts%cbarmin,&
6577  cbarmax=>vcts%cbarmax)
6578 
6579  ! Calculate contribution to FEM of each edge,
6580  ! that is, estimate value of line integral of
6581  ! electric field in the positive idir direction.
6582 
6583  ! Loop over components of electric field
6584 
6585  ! idir: electric field component we need to calculate
6586  ! idim1: directions in which we already performed the reconstruction
6587  ! idim2: directions in which we perform the reconstruction
6588 
6589  ! if there is resistivity, get eta J
6590  if(mhd_eta/=zero) call get_resistive_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,sct,s,e_resi)
6591 
6592  ! if there is ambipolar diffusion, get E_ambi
6593  if(mhd_ambipolar_exp) call get_ambipolar_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,sct%w,x,e_ambi)
6594 
6595  do idir=7-2*ndim,3
6596  ! Indices
6597  ! idir: electric field component
6598  ! idim1: one surface
6599  ! idim2: the other surface
6600  ! cyclic permutation: idim1,idim2,idir=1,2,3
6601  ! Velocity components on the surface
6602  ! follow cyclic premutations:
6603  ! Sx(1),Sx(2)=y,z ; Sy(1),Sy(2)=z,x ; Sz(1),Sz(2)=x,y
6604 
6605  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6606  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d-1+kr(idir,^d);
6607 
6608  ! Set indices and directions
6609  idim1=mod(idir,3)+1
6610  idim2=mod(idir+1,3)+1
6611 
6612  jxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim1,^d);
6613  ixcp^l=ixc^l+kr(idim2,^d);
6614 
6615  ! Reconstruct transverse transport velocities
6616  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim2,vbarc(ixi^s,idim1,1),&
6617  vtill(ixi^s,2),vtilr(ixi^s,2))
6618 
6619  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim1,vbarc(ixi^s,idim2,2),&
6620  vtill(ixi^s,1),vtilr(ixi^s,1))
6621 
6622  ! Reconstruct magnetic fields
6623  ! Eventhough the arrays are larger, reconstruct works with
6624  ! the limits ixG.
6625  if(b0field) then
6626  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim1)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim1)+block%B0(ixi^s,idim1,idim1)
6627  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim2)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim2)+block%B0(ixi^s,idim2,idim2)
6628  else
6629  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim1)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim1)
6630  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim2)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim2)
6631  end if
6632  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim2,bfacetot(ixi^s,idim1),&
6633  btill(ixi^s,idim1),btilr(ixi^s,idim1))
6634 
6635  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim1,bfacetot(ixi^s,idim2),&
6636  btill(ixi^s,idim2),btilr(ixi^s,idim2))
6637 
6638  ! Take the maximum characteristic
6639 
6640  cm(ixc^s,1)=max(cbarmin(ixcp^s,idim1),cbarmin(ixc^s,idim1))
6641  cp(ixc^s,1)=max(cbarmax(ixcp^s,idim1),cbarmax(ixc^s,idim1))
6642 
6643  cm(ixc^s,2)=max(cbarmin(jxc^s,idim2),cbarmin(ixc^s,idim2))
6644  cp(ixc^s,2)=max(cbarmax(jxc^s,idim2),cbarmax(ixc^s,idim2))
6645 
6646 
6647  ! Calculate eletric field
6648  fe(ixc^s,idir)=-(cp(ixc^s,1)*vtill(ixc^s,1)*btill(ixc^s,idim2) &
6649  + cm(ixc^s,1)*vtilr(ixc^s,1)*btilr(ixc^s,idim2) &
6650  - cp(ixc^s,1)*cm(ixc^s,1)*(btilr(ixc^s,idim2)-btill(ixc^s,idim2)))&
6651  /(cp(ixc^s,1)+cm(ixc^s,1)) &
6652  +(cp(ixc^s,2)*vtill(ixc^s,2)*btill(ixc^s,idim1) &
6653  + cm(ixc^s,2)*vtilr(ixc^s,2)*btilr(ixc^s,idim1) &
6654  - cp(ixc^s,2)*cm(ixc^s,2)*(btilr(ixc^s,idim1)-btill(ixc^s,idim1)))&
6655  /(cp(ixc^s,2)+cm(ixc^s,2))
6656 
6657  ! add resistive electric field at cell edges E=-vxB+eta J
6658  if(mhd_eta/=zero) fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+e_resi(ixc^s,idir)
6659  ! add ambipolar electric field
6660  if(mhd_ambipolar_exp) fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+e_ambi(ixc^s,idir)
6661 
6662  fe(ixc^s,idir)=qdt*s%dsC(ixc^s,idir)*fe(ixc^s,idir)
6663 
6664  if (.not.slab) then
6665  where(abs(x(ixc^s,r_)+half*dxlevel(r_)).lt.1.0d-9)
6666  fe(ixc^s,idir)=zero
6667  end where
6668  end if
6669 
6670  end do
6671 
6672  ! allow user to change inductive electric field, especially for boundary driven applications
6673  if(associated(usr_set_electric_field)) &
6674  call usr_set_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,qt,qdt,fe,sct)
6675 
6676  circ(ixi^s,1:ndim)=zero
6677 
6678  ! Calculate circulation on each face: interal(fE dot dl)
6679  do idim1=1,ndim ! Coordinate perpendicular to face
6680  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6681  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d-kr(idim1,^d);
6682  do idim2=1,ndim
6683  do idir=7-2*ndim,3 ! Direction of line integral
6684  ! Assemble indices
6685  if(lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)/=0) then
6686  hxc^l=ixc^l-kr(idim2,^d);
6687  ! Add line integrals in direction idir
6688  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=circ(ixc^s,idim1)&
6689  +lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)&
6690  *(fe(ixc^s,idir)&
6691  -fe(hxc^s,idir))
6692  end if
6693  end do
6694  end do
6695  ! Divide by the area of the face to get dB/dt
6696  where(s%surfaceC(ixc^s,idim1) > 1.0d-9*s%dvolume(ixc^s))
6697  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=circ(ixc^s,idim1)/s%surfaceC(ixc^s,idim1)
6698  elsewhere
6699  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=zero
6700  end where
6701  ! Time update cell-face magnetic field component
6702  bfaces(ixc^s,idim1)=bfaces(ixc^s,idim1)-circ(ixc^s,idim1)
6703  end do
6704 
6705  end associate
6706  end subroutine update_faces_hll
6707 
6708  !> calculate eta J at cell edges
6709  subroutine get_resistive_electric_field(ixI^L,ixO^L,sCT,s,jce)
6710  use mod_global_parameters
6711  use mod_usr_methods
6712  use mod_geometry
6713 
6714  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
6715  type(state), intent(in) :: sCT, s
6716  ! current on cell edges
6717  double precision :: jce(ixI^S,7-2*ndim:3)
6718 
6719  ! current on cell centers
6720  double precision :: jcc(ixI^S,7-2*ndir:3)
6721  ! location at cell faces
6722  double precision :: xs(ixGs^T,1:ndim)
6723  ! resistivity
6724  double precision :: eta(ixI^S)
6725  double precision :: gradi(ixGs^T)
6726  integer :: ix^D,ixC^L,ixA^L,ixB^L,idir,idirmin,idim1,idim2
6727 
6728  associate(x=>s%x,dx=>s%dx,w=>s%w,wct=>sct%w,wcts=>sct%ws)
6729  ! calculate current density at cell edges
6730  jce=0.d0
6731  do idim1=1,ndim
6732  do idim2=1,ndim
6733  do idir=7-2*ndim,3
6734  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==0) cycle
6735  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6736  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6737  ixbmax^d=ixcmax^d-kr(idir,^d)+1;
6738  ixbmin^d=ixcmin^d;
6739  ! current at transverse faces
6740  xs(ixb^s,:)=x(ixb^s,:)
6741  xs(ixb^s,idim2)=x(ixb^s,idim2)+half*dx(ixb^s,idim2)
6742  call gradientx(wcts(ixgs^t,idim2),xs,ixgs^ll,ixc^l,idim1,gradi,.true.)
6743  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==1) then
6744  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)+gradi(ixc^s)
6745  else
6746  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)-gradi(ixc^s)
6747  end if
6748  end do
6749  end do
6750  end do
6751  ! get resistivity
6752  if(mhd_eta>zero)then
6753  jce(ixi^s,:)=jce(ixi^s,:)*mhd_eta
6754  else
6755  ixa^l=ixo^l^ladd1;
6756  call get_current(wct,ixi^l,ixa^l,idirmin,jcc)
6757  call usr_special_resistivity(wct,ixi^l,ixa^l,idirmin,x,jcc,eta)
6758  ! calcuate eta on cell edges
6759  do idir=7-2*ndim,3
6760  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6761  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6762  jcc(ixc^s,idir)=0.d0
6763  {do ix^db=0,1\}
6764  if({ ix^d==1 .and. ^d==idir | .or.}) cycle
6765  ixamin^d=ixcmin^d+ix^d;
6766  ixamax^d=ixcmax^d+ix^d;
6767  jcc(ixc^s,idir)=jcc(ixc^s,idir)+eta(ixa^s)
6768  {end do\}
6769  jcc(ixc^s,idir)=jcc(ixc^s,idir)*0.25d0
6770  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)*jcc(ixc^s,idir)
6771  enddo
6772  end if
6773 
6774  end associate
6775  end subroutine get_resistive_electric_field
6776 
6777  !> get ambipolar electric field on cell edges
6778  subroutine get_ambipolar_electric_field(ixI^L,ixO^L,w,x,fE)
6779  use mod_global_parameters
6780 
6781  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
6782  double precision, intent(in) :: w(ixI^S,1:nw)
6783  double precision, intent(in) :: x(ixI^S,1:ndim)
6784  double precision, intent(out) :: fE(ixI^S,7-2*ndim:3)
6785 
6786  double precision :: jxbxb(ixI^S,1:3)
6787  integer :: idir,ixA^L,ixC^L,ix^D
6788 
6789  ixa^l=ixo^l^ladd1;
6790  call mhd_get_jxbxb(w,x,ixi^l,ixa^l,jxbxb)
6791  ! calcuate electric field on cell edges from cell centers
6792  do idir=7-2*ndim,3
6793  !set electric field in jxbxb: E=nuA * jxbxb, where nuA=-etaA/rho^2
6794  !jxbxb(ixA^S,i) = -(mhd_eta_ambi/w(ixA^S, rho_)**2) * jxbxb(ixA^S,i)
6795  call multiplyambicoef(ixi^l,ixa^l,jxbxb(ixi^s,idir),w,x)
6796  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6797  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6798  fe(ixc^s,idir)=0.d0
6799  {do ix^db=0,1\}
6800  if({ ix^d==1 .and. ^d==idir | .or.}) cycle
6801  ixamin^d=ixcmin^d+ix^d;
6802  ixamax^d=ixcmax^d+ix^d;
6803  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+jxbxb(ixa^s,idir)
6804  {end do\}
6805  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)*0.25d0
6806  end do
6807 
6808  end subroutine get_ambipolar_electric_field
6809 
6810  !> calculate cell-center values from face-center values
6811  subroutine mhd_face_to_center(ixO^L,s)
6812  use mod_global_parameters
6813  ! Non-staggered interpolation range
6814  integer, intent(in) :: ixo^l
6815  type(state) :: s
6816 
6817  integer :: fxo^l, gxo^l, hxo^l, jxo^l, kxo^l, idim
6818 
6819  associate(w=>s%w, ws=>s%ws)
6820 
6821  ! calculate cell-center values from face-center values in 2nd order
6822  do idim=1,ndim
6823  ! Displace index to the left
6824  ! Even if ixI^L is the full size of the w arrays, this is ok
6825  ! because the staggered arrays have an additional place to the left.
6826  hxo^l=ixo^l-kr(idim,^d);
6827  ! Interpolate to cell barycentre using arithmetic average
6828  ! This might be done better later, to make the method less diffusive.
6829  w(ixo^s,mag(idim))=half/s%surface(ixo^s,idim)*&
6830  (ws(ixo^s,idim)*s%surfaceC(ixo^s,idim)&
6831  +ws(hxo^s,idim)*s%surfaceC(hxo^s,idim))
6832  end do
6833 
6834  ! calculate cell-center values from face-center values in 4th order
6835  !do idim=1,ndim
6836  ! gxO^L=ixO^L-2*kr(idim,^D);
6837  ! hxO^L=ixO^L-kr(idim,^D);
6838  ! jxO^L=ixO^L+kr(idim,^D);
6839 
6840  ! ! Interpolate to cell barycentre using fourth order central formula
6841  ! w(ixO^S,mag(idim))=(0.0625d0/s%surface(ixO^S,idim))*&
6842  ! ( -ws(gxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(gxO^S,idim) &
6843  ! +9.0d0*ws(hxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(hxO^S,idim) &
6844  ! +9.0d0*ws(ixO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(ixO^S,idim) &
6845  ! -ws(jxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(jxO^S,idim) )
6846  !end do
6847 
6848  ! calculate cell-center values from face-center values in 6th order
6849  !do idim=1,ndim
6850  ! fxO^L=ixO^L-3*kr(idim,^D);
6851  ! gxO^L=ixO^L-2*kr(idim,^D);
6852  ! hxO^L=ixO^L-kr(idim,^D);
6853  ! jxO^L=ixO^L+kr(idim,^D);
6854  ! kxO^L=ixO^L+2*kr(idim,^D);
6855 
6856  ! ! Interpolate to cell barycentre using sixth order central formula
6857  ! w(ixO^S,mag(idim))=(0.00390625d0/s%surface(ixO^S,idim))* &
6858  ! ( +3.0d0*ws(fxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(fxO^S,idim) &
6859  ! -25.0d0*ws(gxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(gxO^S,idim) &
6860  ! +150.0d0*ws(hxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(hxO^S,idim) &
6861  ! +150.0d0*ws(ixO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(ixO^S,idim) &
6862  ! -25.0d0*ws(jxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(jxO^S,idim) &
6863  ! +3.0d0*ws(kxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(kxO^S,idim) )
6864  !end do
6865 
6866  end associate
6867 
6868  end subroutine mhd_face_to_center
6869 
6870  !> calculate magnetic field from vector potential
6871  subroutine b_from_vector_potential(ixIs^L, ixI^L, ixO^L, ws, x)
6872  use mod_global_parameters
6873  use mod_constrained_transport
6874 
6875  integer, intent(in) :: ixis^l, ixi^l, ixo^l
6876  double precision, intent(inout) :: ws(ixis^s,1:nws)
6877  double precision, intent(in) :: x(ixi^s,1:ndim)
6878 
6879  double precision :: adummy(ixis^s,1:3)
6880 
6881  call b_from_vector_potentiala(ixis^l, ixi^l, ixo^l, ws, x, adummy)
6882 
6883  end subroutine b_from_vector_potential
6884 
6885 end module mod_mhd_phys
